sentences.sContent: Your résumé should highlight your skills and achievements.
sentences.sCn: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.sContent: That weekend in Venice was definitely the highlight of our trip.
sentences.sCn: 在威尼斯度过的那个周末无疑是我们这次旅行最精彩的部分。

sentences.sContent: ...it may highlight your inability to delegate effectively...
...One reason to maintain a formal distance between students and teachers is to highlight the instructor’s role as an authority figure...
...you can highlight a piece of content and make notes...
...the new findings do highlight the benefits of focusing on our food and avoiding TV and multitasking while eating...

...Researchers in Canada just published a study in the journal Psychological Science that says trying to get people to think more positively can actually have the opposite effect: it can simply highlight how unhappy they are...

exam.question: The ________of our trip to London was the visit to Buckingham

answer.explain: 句意：  我们这次旅途中最精彩的部分就是参观白金汉宫。 summit：  顶点， 最高点； height：  高度； peak：  山顶， 峰顶。

synos.tran: 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；[电子]加亮区

remMethod.val: high(高的) ＋ light(发光)  → 突出

words.tran: 增强亮度；突出性，醒目性
使…显著；以强光照射（highlight的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to make a problem or subject easy to notice so that people pay attention to it
the most important, interesting, or enjoyable part of something such as a holiday, performance, or sports competition
